content:
d out using Unique Key. * When data lastly sourced from LDM email for a record, no subsequent update operations are performed on that record. * No deletion or insertion is performed. * Baggage & Cargo handles insertion operations, irrespective of whether it's an offline or online station. * No deletion is performed. Please refer to the Flight Leg Data Model for flight status. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Service|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | | |flightLegId|`schedops.LEG`| |`LEG_NO`| | |carrier|`schedops.LEG`| |`FN_CARRIER`| | |flightNumber|`schedops.LEG`| |`FN_NUMBER`| | |udor|`schedops.LEG`| |`DEP_SCHED_DT`, `DEP_DT`|when `schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` is not null
then `schedops.LEG.DEP_DT`(YYYY-MM-DD)
else `schedops.LEG.DEP_SCHED_DT`(YYYY-MM-DD)| |regId| |`loadAndTrim`|`| | |aircraftType| |`loadAndTrim`|``| | |numberOfTotalBaggage| |`loadAndTrim`|``|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |totalBaggageWeight| |`loadAndTrim`|``|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |numberOfExcessBaggage| | | |N/A in the source system.| |totalExcessBaggageWeight| | | |N/A in the source system.| |bookedTotalCargoWeight|`schedops.leg_pax`| |`CARGO`|when `schedops.leg_pax.USAGE` = “B“ then `schedops.leg_pax.CARGO`| |actualTotalCargoWeight|`schedops.leg_pax`| |`CARGO`|when `schedops.leg_pax.USAGE` = “F“ then `schedops.leg_pax.CARGO`|
